title: Crude shipments every 15 days to Sri Lanka – Energy Ministry
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Ministry of Power and Energy said that a program has been prepared to import a Crude Oil shipment every 15 days to Sri Lanka to continue the operations of the Sapugaskanda Oil Refinery.
The Ministry of Power and Energy said that the Sapugaskanda Refinery has been revived and steps will be taken to commence fuel production soon.
Meanwhile, the Ceylon Petroleum Corporation (CPC) said that the distribution of fuel will continue.
